        public java.io.File simpleJournalDownload(java.lang.String fromDate,
                                          java.lang.String untilDate,
                                          java.lang.String query,
                                          boolean resolveDois,
                                          int rows,
                                          int offset,
                                          java.io.File outputDir)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.io.FileNotFoundException
        utility method for downloading journal articles
        Parameters:
        fromDate - yyyy-mm-dd
        untilDate - yyyy-mm-dd
        query - see CrossRef (can be as simple as "psychology") queries the title
        resolveDois - if true use dx.doi.org to resove URLs
        rows - max urls to download
        outputDir -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • runDailyDownload

        public static int runDailyDownload(java.io.File dailyDir,
                                   java.lang.String fromDate,
                                   java.lang.String untilDate,
                                   int rowsInChunk,
                                   int currentPos,
                                   boolean resolveDois,
                                   BlackList blackList)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.io.FileNotFoundException
        utility method to create and run downloader.
        Parameters:
        dailyDir - top directory
        fromDate - start date as yyyy-mm-dd
        untilDate - until date exclusive
        rowsInChunk -
        deltaoffset -
        currentPos - startin position
        resolveDois - use dx.doi.org to resolve DOIs to URLs
        blackList - regexes of files to be skipped
        Returns:
        next starting position
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
